dt: {bc}the science, art, or practice of cultivating the soil, producing crops, and raising livestock and in varying degrees the preparation and marketing of the resulting products

dt.t: cleared the land to use it for {wi}agriculture{/wi}

et: Middle English, from Middle French, from Latin {it}agricultura{/it}, from {it}ager{/it} field + {it}cultura{/it} cultivation {ma}{mat|acre|}, {mat|culture|}{/ma}
shortdef: the science, art, or practice of cultivating the soil, producing crops, and raising livestock and in varying degrees the preparation and marketing of the resulting products
